name: GKRandom
desc: The common interface for all randomization classes in (or usable with) GameplayKit.

items.name: func nextInt() -> Int
items.desc: Generates and returns a new random integer.

items.name: func nextInt(upperBound: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Generates and returns a new random integer less than the specified limit.

items.name: func nextUniform() -> Float
items.desc: Generates and returns a new random floating-point value.

items.name: func nextBool() -> Bool
items.desc: Generates and returns a new random Boolean value.
